verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twenty וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> [was] one שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's [חֲמִיטַל כ] (חֲמוּטַ֥ל <WH2537> Hamutal ק) בַּֽת־ <WH1323> the daughter יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah מִלִּבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> of Libnah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done יְהוֹיָקִֽים׃ <WH3079> according to all that Jehoiakim

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For עַל־ <WH5921> For through אַ֣ף <WH639> the anger יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> came בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> it came to pass in Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah עַד־ <WH5704> until הִשְׁלִיכ֥וֹ <WH7993> till he had cast them out אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> through פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> from his presence וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <WH4775> rebelled צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> that Zedekiah בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came בַשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> year הַתְּשִׁעִ֜ית <WH8671> And it came to pass in the ninth לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <WH4427> of his reign בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂירִי֮ <WH6224> in the tenth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> in the tenth לַחֹדֶשׁ֒ <WH2320> [day] of the month בָּ֠א <WH935> came נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֨ר <WH5019> [that] Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon ה֤וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵילוֹ֙ <WH2428> he and all his army עַל־ <WH5921> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against וַיִּבְנ֥וּ <WH1129> against it and built עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> against דָּיֵ֖ק <WH1785> forts סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> against it round about

וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> So הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city בַּמָּצ֑וֹר <WH4692> was besieged עַ֚ד <WH5704> until עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of king צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH6667> Zedekiah

בַּחֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <WH7243> And in the fourth בְּתִשְׁעָ֣ה <WH8672> in the ninth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month וַיֶּחֱזַ֥ק <WH2388> was sore הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> the famine בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> in the city וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> so that there was no bread לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> for the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַתִּבָּקַ֣ע <WH1234> was broken up הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> Then the city וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֡ה <WH4421> of war יִבְרְחוּ֩ <WH1272> fled וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <WH3318> and went forth מֵהָעִ֜יר <WH5892> out of the city לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> by night דֶּ֜רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> of the gate בֵּין־ <WH996> between הַחֹמֹתַ֙יִם֙ <WH2346> between the two walls אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and גַּ֣ן <WH1588> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> which [was] by the king's וְכַשְׂדִּ֥ים <WH3778> (now the Chaldeans עַל־ <WH5921> and הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> [were] by the city סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> were all וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הָעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> of the plain

וַיִּרְדְּפ֤וּ <WH7291> pursued חֵיל־ <WH2428> But the army כַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּשִּׂ֥יגוּ <WH5381> and overtook אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> in the plains יְרֵח֑וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> and all his army נָפֹ֖צוּ <WH6327> was scattered מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂוּ֙ <WH8610> Then they took אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> and carried him up אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon רִבְלָ֖תָה <WH7247> to Riblah בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> where he gave אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for מִשְׁפָּטִֽים׃ <WH4941> judgment

וַיִּשְׁחַ֧ט <WH7819> slew מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah לְעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> before his eyes וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> also all the princes יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah שָׁחַ֥ט <WH7819> he slew בְּרִבְלָֽתָה׃ <WH7247> in Riblah

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> the eyes צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah עִוֵּ֑ר <WH5786> Then he put out וַיַּאַסְרֵ֣הוּ <WH631> bound בַֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֗יִם <WH5178> him in chains וַיְבִאֵ֤הוּ <WH935> and carried מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> and the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon בָּבֶ֔לָה <WH894> him to Babylon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥הוּ <WH5414> and put [בְבֵית־ כ] (בֵֽית־ <WH1004> court הַפְּקֻדֹּ֖ת <WH1004> court ק) עַד־ <WH5704> until י֥וֹם <WH3117> till the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> of his death

וּבַחֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַֽחֲמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> Now in the fifth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> in the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הִ֗יא <WH1931> which שְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year תְּשַֽׁע־ <WH8672> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon בָּ֗א <WH935> came נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <WH5018> Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> of the guard עָמַ֛ד <WH5975> abide לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> accept מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> into Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> And burned אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּתֵּ֧י <WH1004> and all the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and all the houses הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of the great שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> [men] burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> he with fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every

חֹמ֥וֹת <WH2346> all the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about נָֽתְצוּ֙ <WH5422> brake down כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֣יל <WH2428> And all the army כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who אֶת־ <WH854> with רַב־ <WH7227> that [were] with the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <WH2876> of the guard

וּמִדַּלּ֨וֹת <WH1803> [certain] of the poor הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> יֶ֥תֶר <WH3499> and the residue הָעָ֣ם ׀ <WH5971> of the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <WH7604> that remained בָּעִ֗יר <WH5892> in the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֹּֽפְלִים֙ <WH5307> and those that fell away אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who נָֽפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> that fell אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> and the rest הָֽאָמ֑וֹן <WH527> of the multitude הֶגְלָ֕ה <WH1540> carried away captive נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֖ן <WH5018> Then Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <WH2876> of the guard

הָעַמּוּדִ֣ים ׀ <WH5982> pillars שְׁנַ֗יִם <WH8147> The two הַיָּ֤ם <WH3220> sea אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one וְהַבָּקָ֞ר <WH1241> bulls שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> the two עָשָׂ֤ר <WH6240> ten נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> were under הַמְּכֹנ֔וֹת <WH4350> that [were] under the bases אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> had made הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> which king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> was beyond הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become מִשְׁקָ֔ל <WH4948> was without weight לִנְחֻשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH5178> the brass כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַכֵּלִ֥ים <WH3627> of all these vessels הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְהָעַמּוּדִ֗ים <WH5982> And [concerning] the pillars שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits [קֹומָה כ] (קֹומַת֙ <WH6967> along ק) הָעַמֻּ֣ד <WH5982> pillar הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of one וְח֛וּט <WH2339> and a fillet שְׁתֵּים־ <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits יְסֻבֶּ֑נּוּ <WH5437> did compass וְעָבְי֛וֹ <WH5672> it and the thickness אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> thereof [was] four אַצְבָּע֖וֹת <WH676> fingers נָבֽוּב׃ <WH5014> [it was] hollow
